data.text: @channelstv They will not assist Nigeria in where assistance are needed most (refinery, power, standard medical facilities etc) - always, indirectly - making donations to some people in Nigeria. It's okay! Thanks
@channelstv If na loan tell them we don't want. Stop devaluing the Naira at will.
@channelstv Am sure the money has already been looted! Stop sending financial assistance in cash to TWCâ€™S especially Nigeria!!

@channelstv We appreciate your support, but it will better the life of the country at large if the infrastructures are built by you and handed over government. By so doing every citizen of Nigeria will be a beneficiary of your kind gesture. Thanks again
@channelstv These USAID people sef be fraudsters, why do they keep doling out money to the country knowing fully well that the money is and will never go to the intended target... pshwww!
@channelstv Thanks but you would have help use it to build standard hospital and handed it over to us because this will be mismanage.
